channel.title: language construct on Dan's Software Engineering Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in language construct on Dan's Software Engineering Handbook

item.title: Function
item.description: A series of instructions that are grouped and callable by a name.

item.title: Method
item.description: A function that has been bound to a class instance. Example: Calling a function: myFunction() // function Calling a method: class MyClass { fun myFunction() {} } instance = new MyClass() instance.myFunction()

item.title: Class
item.description: Related to object-oriented programming. A class is a language construct that allows binding data to methods.
